arts.ttl: Serie A Preview: Bologna vs Napoli – Team News, Line-ups & Prediction
arts.sum: Stadio Renato Dall'Ara is the venue as Napoli and Bologna go head-to-head in Serie A's top-six six-pointer on Sunday. With the international break around the corner, victory is imperative for the home side after several underwhelming performances. The post Serie A Preview: Bologna vs Napoli – Team News, Line-ups & Prediction appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
